primitives.description: Property. Define a volume in 3D A set of solid geometric primitives that make up the volume to define (as a union)

primitive_poses.description: Property. The poses at which the primitives are located

meshes.description: Property. In addition to primitives, meshes can be specified to add to the bounding volume (again, as union)

mesh_poses.description: Property. The poses at which the meshes are located
